SEARCH
Package common

Class StudentFilterService

java.lang.Object
common.StudentFilterService
public final class StudentFilterService extends Object
Provides utility methods for loading students and applying student-side internship filters.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Class

    static final record 
    StudentFilterService.StudentFilters
    Immutable bundle of normalized student filter selections.
